metadata.title: CVE-2023-4874 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Null pointer dereference when viewing a specially crafted email in Mutt>1.5.2 <2.2.12

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mutt - 2.1.4-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mutt package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.4-1ubuntu1.2').
